about_the_game:
One peaceful morning has turned into a nightmare. Your crops, gardens, and rivers are under siege by a herd of massive, rampaging wild hogs. These beasts aren’t just eating everything in sight – they’re destroying everything you hold dear. You and your friends must act fast: grab your bows, set your traps, and prepare for an all-out battle to save your field before it’s too late!

Classic and Modern Weapons

Arm yourself with bows, air rifles, hunting shotguns, or even homemade contraptions to take down the ferocious hogs in your own style.

Clever Traps

Lure the wild hogs into bait traps, cages, or explosive surprises strategically placed to gain the upper hand.

Team-Based Tactics

Assign roles to your team, such as the machine gunner, sniper, or trap setter, to increase your chances of winning against the destructive horde of wild hogs.

Unique Vehicles

Choose the most skilled driver, hop onto the truck bed, and hunt down to eliminate all the ferocious wild hogs.

Ever-Changing Terrain

Each hunt is a fresh experience with procedurally generated maps, from sprawling fields to dense forests teeming with danger.

Online and Local Co-op

Play Online or Couch Co-op! Hogs Rampage lets 1 to 4 players team up, either online or locally on the same screen, for some cooperative fun.

Hogs Rampage blends action-packed gameplay with teamwork and strategy in the most entertaining way possible. Laugh with your friends, scream at near-misses, and celebrate every successful hunt as you take on the cleverest hogs in gaming.

The hogs are rising – now it’s your turn to fight back. Grab your weapons, set your traps, and save your land today!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Hogs Rampage is a co-op action game for 1-4 players where you hunt down destructive wild hogs. Team up in Couch Co-op or online, use creative weapons, and outsmart these smart, fast pigs as you navigate ever- changing terrains. It's a fast, chaotic, and hilarious race to stop the rampaging hogs.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
